Package io.github.izdwuut.yarl

Class YARL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.YARL

  • public class YARL
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Main game class. It stores a reference to a current controller and screen. Every system in a game is created and added to an Ashley engine here, where controller is only responsible for pausing and resuming them according to it's needs.
    Since:
    2017-11-13
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz
